response.original_title: The Edge Of Science: How To Levitate
response.overview: Is it possible to levitate? YouTube Originals and BBC Studios present "the Edge of Science" â€“ a scientific dive into areas beyond our understanding. Along with the host, science enthusiast Rick Edwards, you will get to know the YouTube science community, which can help him fulfill his lifelong dream of levitating. A girl physicist (Diane Cavern) and inventor Colin furze join Rick to try to get him off the ground solely with the help of physics. Will they be able to do it?
response.title: The Edge Of Science: How To Levitate
